pr_title: Separate topic strings for MQTT turnout send and receive

timeline.message: separate topic strings for send and receive

timeline.bodyText:
Noticed now that this state is removed. This is not the same as inconsistent.
MOVING is a controlled state showing that the turnout is switching position. It should not be removed.
timeline.author: elestedt
